input_text:
Job Title: User Research Analyst - Military DoD Skillbridge

Location: Jacksonville, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Florida Blue Military Skillbridge - Digital Department!

Are you looking for your next career step after your military service? Are you within 180 days of release from Active Duty? Interested in Digital experience and healthcare? If so, we may have the perfect opportunity for you.

You can collaborate across development, design, and marketing teams to evaluate current and upcoming user research needs that help to improve product definition and drive business goals.

Use your extensive professional, leadership, and technical skills to support the company’s strategic talent needs. Participation in this program allows service men and women to partake in civilian work where they will receive on the job experience and training in an area that aligns with their interests. Full-time employment opportunities after successful completion of the program may be available.

**You will continue to receive military pay and benefits during this internship**

We are currently looking to host military SkillBridge participant this FALL!

Start Date: September 2, 2024

Location: Remote

Responsibilities:

 Participate in the design and execution of research on various projects ranging from exploratory research to concept validation. Collaborate effectively with interaction and visual designers within the Experience Design team to deliver formative and summative research in cadence with the team’s design process. Work on cross-functional product teams, partnering closely with designers, product managers, developers, and other stakeholders. Assist in the creation of research strategies, coordination of participant recruitment, and facilitation of usability studies. Work directly with research participants. Generate insights that influence product strategy, feature design, and prioritization. Inspire stakeholders with creative and compelling presentation of your findings and insights.


Eligibility Requirements:

Military members must be within the 180 days (approximately 6 months) of their transition from active duty into the civilian world.An approximate 120-day commitment, though this is flexible depending on the need.Candidates must be comfortable working in a remote setting.Grade Officers (E3- E5) Or (O1- O3)


Preferred:

Experience with qualitative and quantitative user research methods.Experience and comfort building rapport with research participants.Strong skills in effectively eliciting insights, observations, and commentary from participants without leading or injecting bias.Strong experience analyzing, synthesizing and delivering/presenting research.


Questions about SkillBridge? Refer to the FAQs found here:

https://skillbridge.osd.mil/faq.htm

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
